Reviews.Title: the website stated that the gsm was unlocked but it was not.......
Reviews.Author: kweku kessie
Reviews.Content: i saw the phone which was unlocked but couldnot use it when i travelled overseas.as a result it need to note so people dont buy it .

Reviews.Title: Not unlocked!!
Reviews.Author: Portia
Reviews.Content: I bought this product as a gift for my aunt who lives in SA. When I sent her the cell phone it turned out its wasn't unlocked and the worst part is non of the network companies in SA are able to unlock it. This is really upsetting because it was advertised as unlocked and that is why I bought it,now my aunt is stuck with a cell she cant use nor sell!!

Reviews.Title: Nokia
Reviews.Author: RICKY
Reviews.Content: This product work well here in the US, you will have no problems with it as long as it is for use here.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy it
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: I order the phone from L2D2 and it is unlocked to use for Tmobile. The phone touch screen has stopped working after 3 months. I tried to return but the seller did not accept it and point me to Nokia support. Do not buy it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Choice...
Reviews.Author: Jesus Perez
Reviews.Content: I have used other brands of equipment and nothing better than Nokia. Excellent Choice. I recommend Nokia everytime. Good Price.

ProductInfo.Name: Nokia C2-02 White Touchscreen Unlocked GSM DualBand Slider Cell Phone
